p: In 2070, the total areas of the medium suitable region will increase by 9.59%, 0.04%, 1.05% and 2.23%. The total highly suitable habitat areas will decrease by 8.19%, 7.39%, 6.31% and 8.83%. The low suitable regions will increase by 0.64%, 0.39% and 0.43% under RCP4.5, RCP 6.0 and RCP8.5, respectively, but will decline by 0.79% under RCP2.6. The distribution pattern will be similar to that in 2050 and shows an expansion in the north, southeast, and southwest and a contraction in the east, west, and southwest ( Fig 8).
